GSD.description:
ext4: avoid cycles in directory h-tree

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit b3ad9ff6f06c1dc6abf7437691c88ca3d6da3ac0. For more details please see the references link.
